My expertise spans both backend and front end development, and I excel in building and configuring web servers for optimal performance. I'm dedicated to problem-solving and staying up-to-date with the latest tech trends. Collaboration is key for me, as I thrive in cross-functional teams to create impactful software solutions that drive user engagement and business growth.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: One of the early projects I cfreated to showcase my knowledge of web development basics. Showing off the classic 3, HTML, CSS and JavaScript, this site allows a hypothetical cookie company to project their estimated sales for each of their locations.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: A kiosk app for a company that creates the next best thing. This app is a randomized survey used to determine which item should be next one that they bring to market. With 3 random and unique products to choose from each round, this application will collect more data than just which one was selected, but also how many times each product was shown. These stats will help the company make its decision on which product to make! The results are saved over every session and tastefully displayed at the end of each round of voting.

projects.title: Memory Snap
projects.description: In collaboration with my classmate, this is a game where you find matching pairs of cards. Based on the classic game Memory, I made this game for my daughter so that she may have a fun way to improve her memory, motor, and color recognition skills.
